title: Kass needs a quote change (patch 5.4)
body:
kassadin says some stuff that dosen't make sense :(

**"I tried to silence my mother once, boy did I regret that"**
I don't understand what this means, it doesn't make sense. Riot should change this to:
**"I tried to nerf my mother once, boy did I regret that"**


**"The balance of power must be preserved" - "Balance above all else"**
This is very confusing, I can't find the meaning of this, I think Riot needs to change this to:
**"The balance of power must be altered" - "Balance below all else"**

When there is a teamfight at the enemy base and when kassadin says **"I'm on my way!"**
Shouldn't he be really be saying **"I'll be there in 5 minutes!"?** (If you use ult to travel)

Also the quote "Silence!" needs to be removed.

replies.body: "I tried to blink over my mother once. Boy, did I regret that."
Rifthop*
Riftcrawl*
Riftwaddle*
Rift " trip and fall on his face"*
Rift "Hey! This place looks familiar...oh yeah...{{item:3070}}"
*"I tried interrupting my mothers channel once, boy did I regret that"*
I feel like that has some dirty alternate meaning that I'm just not getting...
Or, his quote could be "I tried to silence my mother once, but then Riot removed my silence, so boy did I regret that"
I tried to make a unique and not-passive aggressive thread once. Boy, did I regret that.

"I tried to burst my mother once, boy, she out-bursted me".

"I'm on my way!" could also be changed to Malph's quote ""I'm moving as fast as I can." With his voice too.

or, based on a true story "I tried to blink over the nexus once, boy, I regret that."
You have not seen this guy late game.
I used to main him. I know what he does.
Took a liking to him earlier in season 5. Sorry for your loss. {{champion:38}} {{item:3070}}

I played him pre-rework and I started maining him for months post-rework. People used to rage at me because "Kassadin was useless" and "he was a troll pick mid". I stopped maining him when they increased his R debuff duration to 20 seconds and now I tried him and he was pathetic.

When I played him, he was Ok. I haven't played many other assassins, but found {{champion:38}} super fun. Other assassins were a bit of a problem, but I usually did fine with everyone else. Even managed to get 50 kills once.

I saw what they did to him in PBE and thought it was horrible, and many people throughout the threads seemed to agree, so I though I didn't have to worry. Then I saw patch 4.5. Played one more game with him before I went to sleep. Went 12/4/5.
well I mean he could have tried to silence his mother and failed because he didn't have one
"I tried veiger eing my mother once, boy did I regret that"
The Kassadin QQ thread is reeeaaaal.
Wild lee sin approaches
